flawed_nl_solution:
If two pizzas will be delivered at two of the stops, the total number of stops will be 12-2=<<12-2=5>>5 stops.
If there are 5 stops in 40 minutes, then the delivery person needs to average 40/5=<<40/5=8>>8 minutes per stop.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
